availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Evans (Laurel County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Farm laborer in Laurel County in 1860. Private in the 40th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) during the Civil War.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, Not Stated, p. 5. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 433.
